.stroppy.BenchmarkDescriptor.description:
*
 BenchmarkDescriptor defines a complete benchmark consisting of multiple steps.

items.description: * List of steps to execute in the benchmark

.stroppy.BenchmarkDescriptor.steps.description: * List of steps to execute in the benchmark

.stroppy.ColumnDescriptor.description:
*
 ColumnDescriptor defines the structure of a database column.

.stroppy.ColumnDescriptor.constraint.description: * SQL constraint definition for the column

.stroppy.ColumnDescriptor.nullable.description: * Whether the column can be NULL

.stroppy.ColumnDescriptor.primary_key.description: * Whether the column is part of the primary key

.stroppy.ColumnDescriptor.sql_type.description: * SQL data type of the column

.stroppy.ColumnDescriptor.unique.description: * Whether the column has a UNIQUE constraint

.stroppy.Config.description:
*
 Config contains the complete configuration for a benchmark run.

.stroppy.Config.benchmark.description: * BenchmarkDescriptor defines a complete benchmark consisting of multiple steps.

.stroppy.Config.run.description: * RunConfig contains the complete configuration for a benchmark run.

.stroppy.Config.version.description:
*
 Version of the configuration format e.g. proto files version.
 This is used for backward compatibility of configs
 and will be set automatically from binary run if not present.

.stroppy.DateTime.description:
*
 DateTime represents a point in time, independent of any time zone or calendar.

.stroppy.Decimal.description:
*
 Decimal represents an arbitrary-precision decimal number.

.stroppy.Decimal.value.description: * String representation of the decimal number

.stroppy.DriverConfig.description:
*
 DriverConfig contains configuration for connecting to a database driver.
 It includes the driver plugin path, connection URL, and database-specific settings.

items.description: * Additional arguments for the driver plugin

.stroppy.DriverConfig.driver_plugin_args.description: * Additional arguments for the driver plugin

.stroppy.DriverConfig.driver_plugin_path.description: * Path to the driver plugin binary

.stroppy.Generation.Alphabet.description:
*
 Alphabet defines character ranges for string generation.

items.description: * List of character ranges for this alphabet

.stroppy.Generation.Alphabet.ranges.description: * List of character ranges for this alphabet

.stroppy.Generation.Distribution.description:
*
 Distribution defines the statistical distribution for value generation.

.stroppy.Generation.Distribution.screw.description: * Distribution parameter (e.g., standard deviation for normal distribution)

.stroppy.Generation.Range.AnyStringRange.description: * Range for string values that can be parsed into other types

.stroppy.Generation.Rule.description:
*
 Rule defines generation rules for a specific data type.

.stroppy.Generation.Rules.BoolRule.const.description: * Fixed value (if not specified, generates random booleans)

.stroppy.Generation.Rules.DoubleRule.description: * Rules for generating 64-bit floating point numbers

.stroppy.Generation.Rules.FloatRule.description: * Rules for generating 32-bit floating point numbers

.stroppy.Generation.Rules.StringRule.alp.description: * Character set to use for generation

.stroppy.Generation.Rules.StringRule.len.description: * Valid length range for the string

.stroppy.Generation.Rules.UuidRule.const.description: * Fixed UUID (if not specified, generates random UUIDs)

.stroppy.GoExecutor.description:
*
 GoExecutor contains configuration specific to Go-based test execution.
 It controls Go runtime parameters and error handling behavior.

.stroppy.GoExecutor.cancel_on_error.description: * Whether to cancel execution on first error

.stroppy.GoExecutor.go_max_proc.description: * Maximum number of OS threads that the Go runtime can use (0 = use default)

.stroppy.IndexDescriptor.description:
*
 IndexDescriptor defines the structure of a database index.

items.description: * List of column names that are part of this index

.stroppy.IndexDescriptor.columns.description: * List of column names that are part of this index

.stroppy.IndexDescriptor.type.description: * Type of index (e.g., BTREE, HASH, etc.)

.stroppy.IndexDescriptor.unique.description: * Whether this is a unique index

.stroppy.K6Executor.description:
*
 K6Executor contains configuration for k6 load testing tool integration.
 It contains paths to the k6 binary and the k6 test script, as well as
 additional arguments to pass to the k6 binary.

items.description: * Additional arguments to pass to the k6 binary

.stroppy.K6Executor.k6_binary_args.description: * Additional arguments to pass to the k6 binary

.stroppy.K6Executor.k6_script_path.description: * Path to the k6 test script

.stroppy.LoggerConfig.description:
*
 LoggerConfig contains configuration for the logging system.
 It controls log levels and output formatting.

.stroppy.OtlpExport.description:
*
 OtlpExport contains configuration for exporting metrics via OpenTelemetry Protocol (OTLP).
 It specifies the endpoint and metrics prefix for telemetry data export.

.stroppy.OtlpExport.otlp_endpoint_insecu.description: * Disable transport security for the exporter

.stroppy.OtlpExport.otlp_http_endpoint.description: * HTTP endpoint for the OpenTelemetry collector

.stroppy.OtlpExport.otlp_metrics_prefix.description: * Prefix to be added to all exported metrics

.stroppy.QueryDescriptor.description:
*
 QueryDescriptor defines a database query with its parameters and execution count.

.stroppy.QueryDescriptor.count.description: * Number of times to execute this query

.stroppy.QueryParamDescriptor.description:
*
 QueryParamDescriptor defines a parameter that can be used in a query.

.stroppy.QueryParamDescriptor.replace_re.description: * Regular expression pattern to replace with the parameter value default is "${<param_name>}"

.stroppy.RequestedStep.description:
*
 RequestedStep defines a step that should be executed during the benchmark.
 It specifies the step name and the type of executor to use.

.stroppy.RequestedStep.executor.description: * Type of executor to use for this step

.stroppy.RunConfig.description:
*
 RunConfig contains the complete configuration for a benchmark run.

.stroppy.RunConfig.metadata.description: * Arbitrary metadata, may be passed to result labels and json output

.stroppy.RunConfig.run_id.description: * Run identifier for reproducible test runs or debugging

.stroppy.RunConfig.seed.description: * Random seed for reproducible test runs

items.description: * List of steps to execute in order

.stroppy.RunConfig.steps.description: * List of steps to execute in order

.stroppy.StepDescriptor.description:
*
 StepDescriptor represents a logical step in a benchmark.
 It contains a list of operations to perform in this step.

.stroppy.StepDescriptor.async.description: * Whether to execute all operations in this step asynchronously

items.description: * List of operations to perform in this step

.stroppy.StepDescriptor.units.description: * List of operations to perform in this step

.stroppy.StepUnitDescriptor.description:
*
 StepUnitDescriptor represents a single unit of work.
 It can be a table creation operation, a query execution operation, or a transaction execution operation.
 It also specifies whether to execute this operation asynchronously.

.stroppy.StepUnitDescriptor.async.description: * Whether to execute this operation asynchronously

.stroppy.TableDescriptor.description:
*
 TableDescriptor defines the structure of a database table.

items.description: * List of indexes defined on this table

.stroppy.TableDescriptor.table_indexes.description: * List of indexes defined on this table

.stroppy.TransactionDescriptor.description:
*
 TransactionDescriptor defines a database transaction with its queries and execution count.

.stroppy.TransactionDescriptor.count.description: * Number of times to execute this transaction

items.description: * List of queries to execute in this transaction

.stroppy.TransactionDescriptor.queries.description: * List of queries to execute in this transaction

.stroppy.TxIsolationLevel.description:
*
 TransactionIsolationLevel defines the isolation level for a database transaction.

.stroppy.Uuid.description:
*
 Uuid represents a universally unique identifier (UUID).

.stroppy.Value.description:
*
 Value is a variant type that can represent different types of values.
 It's used to represent values that can be of multiple types in a type-safe way.

items.description: * Map of field names to values

.stroppy.Value.Struct.fields.description: * Map of field names to values
